name: 2021 Acura TLX Type S Review: A Sensory Joy
review: Mitsubishi officially started automobile operations in 1917, with the manufacturing of its Model A passenger car.

name: 2021 Ford Mustang Mach 1 Review: Good
review: Some versions of the 2021 Ford Mustang Mach 1 don’t drive much differently from an optioned-up Mustang GT, but other Mach 1s could be quite transformative.

name: 2021 Land Rover Defender Review: Tough Luxe
review: The Defender delivers modern Land Rover SUV qualities, like impressive power and extensive off-road technology, in a distinctive shape that plays off the past.

name: 2022 Toyota Tundra Review: Better Where It Counts
review: Redesigned at long last, the 2022 Toyota Tundra pickup truck prioritizes improvements for the many over novelties for the few.

name: 2022 Mercedes-EQ EQS Review: Ze Germans Embrace ze Future
review: Mercedes' first dedicated EV flagship, the 2022 EQS, is meant to set the tone for all future electric Mercedes — and it mostly succeeds.

name: 2021 Porsche 911 Turbo Review: How to Successfully Maintain
review: More a luxury grand tourer these days than a hardcore sports car, Porsche’s flagship 911 is still an amazing (and expensive) leather-lined beast.
